name: Defense Craft
description:
Defense Craft is a 16 bit, tile-based local-multiplayer game where one player defends their land, resisting attackers by building walls, and whacking and shoving away. While the other player tries to conquer it by knocking down walls and out-witting their opponent in this 2 player competitive action-strategy game.

NOTE: In the original version (playable on this page) the attacking player spawns to the right out of view. You'll need to move left before seeing your character.

Designed by Alessio Susi. Art by Manolo Marcenò. Programming by Kevin Lynch and Elano Vasconcelos.
